chapters.title: Chapter 1: Fanning the Sparks
chapters.info: Bela, p. 60 (45)—Siuan's brown horse. She originally belonged to Tam al'Thor, who used her as his workhorse in the sheep pasture. Egwene rode her from Emond's Field to Tar Valon as well. She is quite gentle, but Siuan treats her as a vicious beast that cannot be trusted.
